name: Galactic Generation
description:
Controls:
  • Exploration Mode
MovementRight-Click + MouseRotationLeft-Click + MouseZoomScrollwheel
  • Spaceship Mode
MovementW / A / S / DRotationMouse

Galactic Generation experimented with mesh generation in the form of planets and distributed them in more complex structures, such as solar systems. 

All planets and terrestrial forms are generated in runtime and distributed around the single star in the generated solar system.
